markdownRemark.html:
What takes up my energy? What do I spend the most time on? Does it lead me to things I really want? I’m starting this blog for a March challenge I set with my roommate. Each month we set 5 goals and post them on the fridge for accountability. As we accomplish each goal, we cross it off.

Each goal is time bound, metric driven, ambitious, and rolls up to a larger objective. My goals have been mostly focused on health, fitness, financial, educational, and/or career. I try to set the goals to be something ambitious, with an 80% chance of accomplishing it, but it won’t “take a miracle”.

Cheers to crossing off one of my goals this month!
